data.text: Mwana yeli na ubala kotegeleza malagizo ga tatake,
Munhu yanogile koja ganogile gake kulawa mmulomo wake,
Munhu yokaliza mulomo wake kokaliza ugima wake,
Mnyeke kosulukila lakini honda yapate kinhu chochose,
Yeli na haki kowihila uvizi,
Haki yomkaliza munhu yosang'hana ganogile,
Munhu imoja koitenda mgoli kumbe kabule kinhu,
Munhu tajili kolondeka kuliha kwa ugoli wake kukaliza ugima wake,
Yeli na haki kong'ala kamba taa,
Kibuli chogala ndwagi,
Ugoli wa himahima osegela,
Tamanilo hadina vikizwa dolumiza moyo,
Yobezeli mafundizo koibananga mwenyego,
Mafundizo ga munhu yeli na ubala ayo nzasa ya ugima,
Nzewele zogala kutogoligwa,
Munhu mbala kosang'hana kila kinhu kwa kugelegeza goya,
Msenga yehile kowagela wanhu mmagazo,
Ukiwa na kinyala vompata ija yogalema mafundizo,
Kupata gaja gousulukila koudeng'heza moyo,
Yoilumba na mbala na heyo kokuwa mbala,
Wene nzambi opata mikubulo,
Munhu yanogile kowalekela uhazi unogile ulelo wake,
Mgunda wa mkiwa odaha kulela ndiya nyingi,
Yoleka kumzuma mwanage kwa mbalati hamnogela,
Yeli na haki kana ndiya ya kumwenela,
